website_summaries.verdict: The perfect blend of superb craftsmanship and luxurious comfort. A high-end option that lives up to the brand name.
pros: These slippers look good enough for quick trips outside of the house, and come with a rubber outsole that's up to the job
Crafted from the finest materials with meticulous attention to detail
Durable enough for years of wear

customer_reviews.title: Possibly fake?
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of UGG slippers I purchased just 2 months ago. A week or so ago i noticed that my slipper was hurting my foot in the middle, so I lifted the insole to investigate. I found that the sole of the slipper was splitting in the half. I own and have owned many pairs of uggs, some of then for 4+ years and this has never been a problem. Very very disappointed. Will never buy "UGGs" from Amazon again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This is counterfeit. The qr code scans to a blank fake page. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ok

customer_reviews.title: I am now stuck with these and not happy about it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter for Christmas and just gave them to her. After reading the reviews and talking with people, I ordered a size up. She normally wears a 10 and so I ordered the 11. Well lo and behold they are too big! So now, I wanted to see if I could exchange them, and it says I cannot because I did my Christmas shopping a little too early. The return policy needs to be extended during the holiday season. I am now stuck with these and not happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Squillante

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy online. You need to try on
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Ugg slippers for a very long time so I ordered them for my grown children for Christmas. The quality was as expected but the sizing was wrong and inconsistent. Two pairs both women's size 8 we're not even close in size. This was the same with both men's and women's. I bought myself size 9 Ansley which I have worn before and they are very small. I kept them and am trying to get them to stretch as I know they will. Out of the 8 Pairs I ordered only 2 we're not returned. Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Soltes

customer_reviews.title: Not a typical UGG fit
customer_reviews.text: I have any number of UGG boots and moccasins. This pair was so small that I couldn't wear them. I wear a size 7 and ordered a size 7. I gave them to my granddaughter who wears a size 6. I generally buy directly from UGGS .I may stick to buying my UGG products directly from the company. This was a waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W.

customer_reviews.title: Different Fit than previous years ( Ugg Ansley Slippers )
customer_reviews.text: These Slippers are different the previous Ugg Ansley Slippers that I had purchased, This is my 3rd pair...This version of the Slipper is much shorter in the Heel making them very uncomfortable. Also, be aware that this seller "Shoe Mall" will charge $6.95 for a Return.
customer_reviews.author: A.Smith

customer_reviews.title: These will not stretch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these same slippers several years ago, same size, they were perfect in every way. They finally got worn looking so I thought I'd treat myself to a new pair for Christmas last year. I have tried to wear these new slippers thinking they might stretch out a little. They did not. Looking in the label I can see they were made in two different countries. Obviously the new slippers were either made with a different kind of leather or they were just cut too small. I waited too long hoping they would wear in but they did not. If you purchase these, I recommend you get one size larger or return them immediately if they don't feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: VONI SAXBURY

customer_reviews.title: Returning mine.
customer_reviews.text: The pair I received felt like "compression" slippers. The problem appears to be the inlaid wool sole. It doesn't seem properly sized and has a ridge around the edges. This caused the slipper to feel too short, too narrow and compressed in the toe area. I slid my fingers into the toe area and it was a tight fit for them. Dang. Was looking forward to comfy UGGs for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: P. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Think again about these
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the quality of these slippers and sent them back. The right fit considerably looser than the left. It slipped off my heel - wouldn't stay on. This was already a size 12, (I normally wear 11), so there was no other option. I did not think the construction quality looked especially good either. I think Uggs are over rated in general and won't try them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake, smelly, no ugg shoe box and used!
customer_reviews.text: Fake. Not made in Australia. No ugg box like the first pair I bought -- plus they arrived in an old shoe box--not an ugg one--with some balled up tissue paper. The smell was repugnant. They're going back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bagheeratwins

customer_reviews.title: Sizing was off on this style
customer_reviews.text: This moccasin was just as described. It was UGG quality. It was just too small. I ordered the same size as my UGG boots and I couldn't even get my foot in it. I read the reviews and thought I'd be safe ordering the same size as other UGG products, but it was just a smaller shoe/slipper. I know it will probably stretch and the fur will matte down but had I been able to get my foot in it I might have considered keeping and hoping for the best. Maybe it was just this pair but I would suggest ordering up based on my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Marx

customer_reviews.title: A bit Snug, but nice
customer_reviews.text: These are really well made. I like the fact that on the cordovan color I ordered, the soles are cream colored. Black ones can make marks on your carpeting. They do fit snugly. I wear a 10, but ordered an 11. In order to wear socks with them, I had to cut out some of the very thick fuzzy wool lining. If I were barefoot, they'd fit fine. Usually I pay about $19 for moccasins, but they fall apart within four months. I thought I'd try these, even though they were expensive at $59. I think that in the long run, these will be worth it (I hope). They were made in Viet Nam.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Claire

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for our mom. She loved it! Do note that the sizes runs 1 size smaller. We had to return a size 6 and exchange for a size 7 because it didn't fit. Other than that, great item!
customer_reviews.author: ieclbc

customer_reviews.title: Now running small
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a pair of Ainsley slippers every fall since 2015 and was looking forward to the arrival of my 2018 pair, a month ago. Sadly, even after wearing them every day for four weeks, they’re just too small. The tag inside confirms they’re size 11, but they feel like size 10. My feet were cramping every night, as I tried to stretch them in, to no avail. They’re worth every penny when they fit . . .when they don’t, they’re a waste. Won’t be buying anymore. If shorting the leather used to make these, was the goal, Uggs will lose out on the long run. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: RobinDTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Practical
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to around the house slipper. I can go to the mailbox, etc. but still have warm feet and comfort during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about these
customer_reviews.text: These mocs are great! Warm, attractive, and best of all -- these don't have those leather ties that never stay tied. I ordered my usual size and they felt almost too tight out of the box, but I knew the shearling would loosen after a day of wear and they did exactly that and within hours of wear they fit like a charm. The coastal green color is gorgeous and I plan to bring these to work since they do not look like slippers but can sub for office wear depending on the office.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy & durable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers/moccasins! I’ve bought them for myself & as gifts. Those who have received them love the warmth & comfy slip on/off, yet they stay on when walking. My best friend said she wears them everywhere. I’ve even worn mine out to the store because they’re really durable. If you typically wear a half size, order up to the next whole size. I also sprayed mine with ScotchGuard prior to wearing & feel that’s helped protect against stains & wear. However, I do NOT recommend wearing outside in the rain or snow - kind of common sense, but just want to put that out there! These shoes are definitely worth the money! ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Christy

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving these slippers a three because after reading all the reviews I was so excited to finally get some slippers that would fit my small feet. I am suspicious because I also read a lot of reviews complaining that they had received fakes. My slippers do not say UGG Australia on them as all others did and they are not as comfy and fitting as the reviewers mostly complimented. I thought, finally a slipper that will fit and stay on my feet. I bought a 5, which is what I wear, but they were never tight, or even slightly tight. I'm disappointed and want to make sure I do have the original UGG slippers and not some fakes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Noel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable, quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair many years ago in feather and locomotive grey. They were lost and I was very disappointed in the color choices these day. Quality is the same with stitching, fleece, warmth, and fit, just hate that I had to pick a very bland color. Hope these last me another 7 years and better colors are available in the future. I have high arches, perpetually cold feet, and a longer second toe. These fit well, are comfortable, and best of all, WARM.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love them but they don't work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this slipper 5 stars because I love the way it looks and how well made it is, but it runs very small. I returned my 7s for 8s and am looking forward to the new ones to arrive and will update my review at that time. If you buy this slipper size UP. Don’t even consider for a second getting your usual size or you will be returning yours too UPDATE: I received the 8's which were way too big. Apparently these slippers are not the right ones for my 7.5 feet. I will now try a different style. I’m disappointed bc this is what I really wanted :(
customer_reviews.author: Jaxenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Reviewing just out of the box, initially fits snug (Size 7)
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a size 6.5 in shoes, so I had bought a size 6.5, but it was too small. I then sent it back (very easy refund process btw) and purchased a half size up to size 7. The size 7 on my (wider than typical) bare feet feels narrow and right now fits comfortably snug. I don't think I'll need to be wearing socks while wearing these as they are very warm. The inside of the shoes are soft and does not rub the heel/sides of my feet painfully, no breaking in period required! The soles squeak on my polished cement and wooden floors, its hilarious now, but we'll see down the track.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Ugg? No....Ugh! Unwearable—waste of $$$$.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slippers 6 months ago. They have developed a fold in the lining (see picture) that goes right across the arch of my right foot and is so uncomfortable that they have become unwearable. For nearly $100 this should not happen. Furthermore, they have never stretched enough to be truly comfortable—and the size higher fell off my feet. I'm going to have to trash them. I'm going to L.L. Bean and buying some decent slippers! But I'm angry.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl King

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, Will Be Good for A to AA Widths
customer_reviews.text: This is not a medium width, as labeled by its maker. It is narrow. The length is true to size. The sheepskin will stretch to fit almost any width, but if you have a medium-to-wider foot you have to kind of balance on the narrow, thick rubber sole. (The Cream color is gorgeous, and hard to find from other makers, so I might be willing to get used to that. YMMV.) Big points for quality; it's everything Ugg is reputed to be in that respect. However, they should label accurately for width sizing. And offer other widths besides narrow!
customer_reviews.author: Helen White Noble

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased new slippers for the home and this is the pair she chose. She really loves them and says that they are comfortable and warm. She originally purchased a size 9 because that's her size for sneakers but those had her heel popping out on every step. With a size 8, she said they are snug but knows that UGG's stretch out a little bit. A few days into wearing them and they fit like a glove. The color matches the picture accurately and they look great in person!
customer_reviews.author: RafikiM.

customer_reviews.title: Best Slipper I have found for my picky feet.
customer_reviews.text: This slipper is warm and has sheepskin on the inside and on sole, it runs true to a medium width, I am slightly wide, so I needed to wear this for a while to stretch out the sides and it is leather so it does give. Like the solid sole unlike so many other slippers that have no support. I wish this came with even more arch support; but the best I could find. The quality seems good. My feet are difficult to fit so I'm happy with this slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Mode

customer_reviews.title: My feet are so cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very very pleased! They are so soft and cozy! When I first put them on they were a bit snug. As I continued to wear them they soon fit perfectly. I usually wear a 8.5 but half sizes were not available in this shoe. I did order the 8 which like I said they were a bit snug at first but feel great now. They are a little pricey for slippers but I do think they will last a long long time. I’m gonna order my mom a pair of these cozy slippers for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Colin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and functional
customer_reviews.text: The more I wear these, the more I like them. I usually do slip on style slippers and avoided this style - no need, you can step into these. They do wear in a bit the more you wear them but so far they are still snug enough for me. I wear a 9 and bought a 9 - snug at first but not too small. The lining is super warm and comfy, they look cute and they are comfortable. My house is all wood floors so I wear slippers a lot just to help my feet not hurt and these are great, the bottoms help me grip and keep me going all day.
customer_reviews.author: Cmj

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slippers before Easter and wore them on Easter Sunday. They seemed to fit well so I wore them on Easter Monday. I woke up on the following Tuesday with my left foot swollen to twice its normal size. I immediately called my doctor who thought I had a blood clot and sent me for a scan. There was no blood clot - I believe I had an allergic reaction to the wool! Only in my left foot. Hard to believe. I ended up spending 3 days in bed with my foot propped up and ice on my foot. Anyone else experience this type of reaction?
customer_reviews.author: maureen magee

customer_reviews.title: Super happy feet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes. I have them in the lt blue. I wear them constantly. I ordered a black pair for travel. Yes I know it sounds silly but they are so darn comfortable. -The tread is great for the outdoors. -I normally wear a 9-9.5. The 10s are a perfect fit. -Because they are suede I strongly recommend treating them with the protective stuff. -The price-I am what I like to call frugal. These are 100% worth the price. They make for super happy feet. I will probably get another color.
customer_reviews.author: Ahby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slippers, runs small!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these slippers! The only thing I could complain about is they run small. It took a few weeks to break in, but they will stretch and I still love them!
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Winter Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these moccasins! My first purchase was the "chocolate" & I loved them so much that I couldn't resist buying black & chestnut too. My UGG boot size is 6. I bought the same size for these moccasins. While most people wear them inside, I wear them out & about. They are so comfortable & keep my feet nice & warm. I've even shoveled snow on my driveway & they still look good as ever! I actually now prefer wearing these over my boots, because these are much more comfortable & easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha703

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous but size up by 1/2
customer_reviews.text: 1) I ordered 1/2 size up and the fit was "snug". After wearing a few hours, the fit was ideal. 2) The "gray" is a warm tone, a bit taupe. 3) Lined with real sherpa pile, will warm up cold feet. 4) The construction and styling make the slipper flattering on your feet. I dislike when mocassins look huge and sloppy but these slippers were tailored and trim looking. Bonus, sole of shoe extends over heels, so I can use these for driving. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mama'Othree

customer_reviews.title: The slippers for creating happy feet
customer_reviews.text: This slipper is amazingly comfortable. I was having issues with the muscles in my feet cramping from working from home with extended time walking around on our hardwood floors with bare feet. Within two days of owning these, aches gone and my feet are so happy! I was worried that on warm days that the slippers (specifically the fluffy wool inside) would be hot or even worse, sweaty; but I’ve had zero issues. I honestly have zero regrets about this purchase and actually bought my husband a pair as well! Ugg slippers will now be a staple in our house.
customer_reviews.author: MomRN007

customer_reviews.title: Ugg slippers Womens
customer_reviews.text: WomensUgg Slippers.. I normally wear a 9.5 so ordered a 10. They felt snug, but read reviews and decided to wear in house.. after an hour or so of breaking in they fit perfectly..It's a snug fit due to the lining so if you like loose then order up in size. I have had many brands of moccasins and these by far are made the best. Slippers I could almost open a store.. these are so comfy u can't go wrong. Btw.. they are quite nice looking too. not sure why one review said ugly.. but these are neat looking on the foot.. They are keepers!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews, I decided on these, and they did not disappoint. They are true to size ( I wear size 9), have a comfortable toe box, and just the right amount of cozy fluff to keep my feet warm, but not hot. They are well made and I expect to get lots of miles (in the house) in these slippers. Will order a second pair just in case they decide to no longer make, which inevitably happens when I find something I really like. Give them a try....think you’ll agree.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small.
customer_reviews.text: These run ridiculously small. I'm a size 10, and the size 10 felt like an 8. There was no way I could keep them. They were on the narrow side as well, but I couldn't believe how short they were! I kept rechecking the size on them because I was in such disbelief. There's no way they would ever stretch out because I couldn't walk in them! I returned them the next day. I have UGG boots and these felt nothing like the boots. It was really disappointing because they look really cute, but they're useless if I can't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER FREEMAN

customer_reviews.title: The Best Moccasins Money Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are a joy to wear, as all Ugg products usually are. I owned this same pair previously for four years until they wore out from everyday wear. I switched to Land’s End after receiving them as a gift, and they lasted half the time. These are truly the best moccasins you can buy! About sizing: I wear an 8.5, so I ordered an 8. I’d highly recommend ordering down a half-size, if that’s the case for you. The sheepskin should be snug and will stretch to conform to your foot over time.
customer_reviews.author: Anna S.

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer and less comfortable than a normal ugg
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in August but only started wearing them now as winter set in and I think they are fake. They are a lot stiffer than my other pairs, which are the same type of shoe but bought directly from ugg. The furr inside is different, but still warm. The size is right but normally uggs soften and stretch so I buy a smaller size these are stiff and not stretching. Overall it's an ok shoe just not ugg quality.
customer_reviews.author: michell guzelgul

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers just run small
customer_reviews.text: Love the slippers but I think they run a little small to size. I wear a size 9 in UGG boots and decided to get same size in slippers. Unfortunately, the toe box is smaller and my toes are at the end of the slipper end. Comfort wise they are great and also warm. Would buy again but would increase size by 1/2 size from normal to ensure that toes won’t hit the end.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but itchy and tight.
customer_reviews.text: Ugg slippers are nice and warm just don’t expect real linings like they used to sell.These are wool inside and scratch the daylights out of your feet. I wear socks to afford this and to add extra warmth,living in the mountains you are cold 90% of the time.Very nice looking slipper plus the bonus of a nice sole that you can wear outside if need be.They run very small and tight.So if you don’t wish to break in slippers order one size larger.They do stretch out after they’ve been worn awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Aubree

customer_reviews.title: Excellent slippers very warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: This slipper always runs a little tight at first but after a week they fit perfect bought my first pair in Lake Placid same thing but they do stretch out I had my first pair for 12 years before they fell apart. I also wear mine without socks for now as they continue to stretch I will be able to wear socks. Will continue to buy Uggs😁
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: The slippers initially felt too small because of all the shearling lining but after wearing them for a day or two the shearling got pressed down and now they fit really well. I especially like the rubber tread so I can run outside to grab the mail or put out the garbage without changing shoes. Plus they look nice... The price is a little steep but they are great slippers and I anticipate that I won't need another pair for many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Crile

customer_reviews.title: FAKE UGGS!
customer_reviews.text: I went to the official Ugg website because I suspected these were fake & THEY ARE FAKE. The 1st picture shows the side of the real Uggs and you can see the word Ugg along with their registered trademark. The 2nd picture is what was mailed to me & shows no trademark logo. True Uggs, ( per their website) states that their boxes always have a separate lid. The box I received has a hinged lid. According to their website, it is one of the first clues that these were fake. I found several more reasons they are fake per the Ugg website.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan W Combs

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes, gushed a bit in the review. Can't be beaten for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes. So much so that I ordered again in case they stopped making them. I'm still wearing the pair I bought 3 or 4 years ago. Nothing wrong with them, and they get a-lot of use. You get what you pay for. When the ones I have now wear out I will have these to go to. Oh, when I didn't put perfect on the toe box, or whatever it's only because it takes a couple of weeks to fit beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Comfortablynumb

customer_reviews.title: Heaven for Cold Feet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the slippers for my 87 year old mother who has cold feet all the time. I wanted something that had a bit of a sole so she could use them to go out and get the mail, etc. Needless to say, these totally fit the bill for her - she has nice warm feet, the soft sheepskin is easy on her "not great" feet and she also feels stable in them, bonus. These were the perfect choice and she finds no downside.
customer_reviews.author: Paula E Shubat

customer_reviews.title: The Real Deal UGG's
customer_reviews.text: No question, these are the real deal UGG's. I was worried reading other reviews that these may be counterfeit, but they are legit. I was also worried they wouldn't fit, but I wear a Women's size 9 and ordered a Women's size 9 and they fit perfectly. These feel like walking on cloud pillows, but with a sturdy sole. I can wear them indoors and outdoors. Very glad I purchased these, was almost going to buy a competing brand that were more affordable. This was well worth the money and these should last me a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Positively Perfect Probabilities

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: Great slippers. Very comfortable and nice support. I got them mainly because I needed more support for my feet walking on hardwood floors. I'm a size 8.5 normally so ordered an 8 and they were too small. A 9 fit perfectly. Worth the price as I feel these slippers will last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: These are the BEST house shoes I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST house shoes I’ve ever purchased!!! GREAT support, super warn and comfortable and my foot doesn’t sweat in them. I wear mine with socks. My feet sweat like crazy if I go without socks. HOWEVER, my mom doesn’t wear socks with her sand her feet NEVER sweat. So... everyone is different. If your feet normally sweat in stuff like this, they probably still will in these. Regardless, I would buy these again & again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl423

customer_reviews.title: Is this a true UGG slipper?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this same exact slipper in 2016....loved them. Ordered these in 2019 and I have been very disappointed in the quality of the left slipper. The inner sole bunches up under my foot and I have to take off the shoe, straighten out the inner lining. These slippers cost way too much for me to be doing this....I would like to have a replacement pair. Ugg quality is much better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M Wall

customer_reviews.title: Very classy UGGly slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I googled “best women’s slippers” and these came up #1. I ordered them as a special gift for my daughter who absolutely loves them. She can easily dash out of the house since there is a non-suede sole. They are super plush and ultra comfy. The chocolate color is really very rich looking - not too brown. Her apartment is over a drive through garage so her floors are always cold. Now her feet stay warm and comfortable. They will last for years. They are pricey but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Flyfisher

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit! But beautiful and comfortable shoe overall!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product however I do want to write this review to make it very clear to anyone who is going to purchase that this item is much smaller than expected! I wear an 8 1/2 and ordered a 9 and it is quite snug! I have ugg boots and never had this issue. I did read in other reviews that they will stretch so I am not sending them back in hopes that they have some stretch in them as I think a 10 would be far too big. But if you are not willing to give it the time and want to wear socks at all this is not the moccasin for you!
customer_reviews.author: 311fan

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality that these shoes used to be
customer_reviews.text: The first pair of Ugg house shoes that I bought were awesome. Lots of cushion on the inside to comfort and keep my feet warm. I bought another pair in a different color and it feels like only half the cushion on the inside compared to the first pair. I was a little unhappy with that change in quality.
customer_reviews.author: SJF

customer_reviews.title: 20% restocking fee😩
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service. Bought October 28th for my wife for Christmas and needed a bigger size. Was told would have to pay a 20% restocking fee.. will never buy from UGG again.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Small compared to other Uggs
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9.5 and ordered down to the 9 as I have for several prior pair of Ugg slippers and could not even get my foot into the slipper to try it on. I even double-checked the tag to see if the wrong size had been put in the box. (It wasn't; shoe size was as marked on the box) Then I held it up to the last 2 pair of Ugg slippers I bought (Litney and Hailey), and realized this Ansley slipper really is just smaller - both in length and opening width.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieO

customer_reviews.title: good but tight
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews beforehand so I knew they would be tight upon arrival. I ordered my true size, 7, and they were quite snug, lots of fluff in there! When I wear them barefoot, they're pretty comfortable, although the back kinda rubs, but I might just be sensitive. I feel this way about a lot of footwear. I have been trying to wear mine with socks hoping they'll stretch a little. I will not be returning them because size 8 would be too large, but if you're a half size, you might want to round up.
customer_reviews.author: TTheiler

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small . Now ,I use UGG size 10 and they are ok just very old that’s why I bought another . And reading another reviews , I thought I should buy with one size bigger than my size. And so I did. I bought 11 size , an shock , they are too small. Smaller than size 10.
customer_reviews.author: Onyx

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: UGGs no longer run big, they run small. I have always worn a size 7 in uggs even though my size is 7.5. I had to return and order up to a size 8 and even then they are still very snug. Comfortable, but snug! So be aware they run small! Other than that they’re great quality and this is my third pair of UGG Ansley slippers, very happy with them as always. I also recommend wearing them with thin socks, by the way, so the insides don’t get all yucky.
customer_reviews.author: mcnini_77

customer_reviews.title: Pricey. Iconic—and definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: UGG Ainsleys are my favorite house slipper. My recent purchase is my 4th pair. They are almost impossible to wear out so my multiple purchases are mostly for color changes. I have a long, very narrow foot so would buy a narrow if available. In winter with socks, certainly a good choice for taking kids to school or activities or making a mailbox run if weather isn’t foul. A bit pricey but quality always is. This is a “no risk purchase” with years of a great reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers that run short
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for Christmas. She wears a 10 so that's what I purchased. They were too short and hurt her toes, so we exchanged them for an 11 because they don't come in half sizes. They are much more comfortable and she likes them very much, but hopes they won't eventually start to slip on her heels as the fur lining flattens. I would recommend at least being prepared to have to size up.
customer_reviews.author: BHT

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, I did not like the fit of this Ugg slippers
customer_reviews.text: I decided to splurge and buy Ugg slippers. The best price I found was through Amazon. As recommended, I ordered my regular size. The slipper was too small in width (I wear a medium) and it was entirely too small in length. I returned them and ordered a half size up. The half size up was too large. I had to return them both. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: ShenValley

customer_reviews.title: Finally caved and got these..my feet are in heaven!
customer_reviews.text: Recently switched from carpets to hard wood floors and these slip ons have been a godsend!!! Soft and plush on the inside, good arch support, and super cute to boot. Not to mention they have a good sole for the gentler outdoor grounds. Treat the suede as soon as you get them though!!!! They are not waterproof of course lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: I like these, but...
customer_reviews.text: I have several pair of these because I am diabetic and have problems with my feet. The driving moc sole helps keep me steady, and the lining keeps my skin in good shape. However, the size I usually wear is a bit too small, and one size larger is way too big. So I go for the smaller size but have some mild discomfort. Half sizes would be a wonderful accommodation from Uggs, and for a hundred-dollar moccasin doesn't seem like too much to ask.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Ross, Miami, FL

customer_reviews.title: Warm and slip on easily
customer_reviews.text: I finally found what I wanted! These keep my feet really warm. They are comfortable and supportive. I usually wear a 7.5 or 8 and the 8 fits perfectly after wearing for about a week. The fluffy shearling gets matted down some after wearing, so if they initially feel tight, they will loosen. I like that these hug my feet and don’t flip-flop around like open back clogs do. They are easy to slip on without having to use your hands. My feet get a little sweaty at times, but not bad. I got the gray color and love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Coffin

customer_reviews.title: they seem kind of soft and the more I wear them in the more comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind these are small, they seem kind of soft and the more I wear them in the more comfortable they are. However, for some reason the black suede has started to stain everything. The back portion of my slipper (the furry part) is stained and it has stained random parts of my foot black. I don't understand it! I don't think this should be happening with $100 pair of slippers that I just purchased not too long ago.
customer_reviews.author: vl

customer_reviews.title: I love these slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. Nice and warm. I would have gave 5 Star, except the slipper stitching rubs and hurts my little toe on left foot, the right foot is fine.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: The VERY BEST slippers / moccasins !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these they are warm and comfy, got them to replace a previously owned pair that got ruined. Love, love, love these! I am usually a size 8 or 8.5 depending on the shoe - I got these in an 8. Having had a pair previously I knew I had to allow for a few days of break in ... they are snug at the beginning. They fit absolutely perfectly after that... they almost feel as if they mold to your footprint!
customer_reviews.author: Fran NY

customer_reviews.title: Great support but runs small
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality slipper that provides good support. I was looking for something with a non slip sole to walk around on hard wood floors that provided me Support and this slipper meets my needs. It is warm and since it is wool inside I am concerned it may be too hot for summers. This shoe does run small so Id size up of your whole size tends to be tight or you are a half size.
customer_reviews.author: amazonluver

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These were supposed to be new. The inside was lambs wool and when new is fluffy and loose. These were matted and mashed and formed to someone’s foot,especially around the toes. The shoe was stretched out as if someone needed a larger size that wore them. The bottom of the shoes were worn off from wear which would not have happened in a short time. What upset me was they were shipped to me without being checked out, probably from a previous return. I just hope someone else doesn’t get them on an order and they are discarded. They are clearly USED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!! Exactly what I have been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a straight 9 1/2, I bought the 10 and they fit PERFECT!!! I have been looking for the perfect slipper for three years now. I finally said let me try the UGG slipper. It is pricey, so I was trying to buy all the lower cost slippers. None fit me... they weren't warm, they hurt my heel, they didn't last. I sucked up the cost hoping they will last for years. Once I got them I fell in love! They are extremely comfortable, warm and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality slippers
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and comfortable. I tried these on at a store because I heard they run a little small. Glad I tried them on because the next size up was too big. I ordered my regular size and they were a tad snug at first because of the fluffy lining. Now that they are worn in, fit is perfect! I ordered the purple color which is beautiful in person. I haven't had any issue with the color running if they've gotten a little wet.
customer_reviews.author: Mel C

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an 8 Wide shoe, but since no wides and no half sizes, I ordered the 9. It fits like a glove. Which is not a bad thing. But I feel like wearing socks with the slippers makes them too tight. But they are wonderful, like a hug for your feet! And I use them every day, its easy to take the dogs out back (I don't leave the porch) and not have to change into sneakers! Will definitely buy again but might opt for the 10?
customer_reviews.author: Patrick R. Price

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is terrible
customer_reviews.text: So I am usually an 8, and when the size 8 came, it was SO uncomfortably small, I couldn't even stand to have it on my foot for more than a few minutes. I returned the 8, and bought a 9. So of course, isn't the 9 HUGE and falling off my foot? There really needs to be 1/2 sizes. I'm really disappointed because I had really been looking forward to these to help me get through this very cold winter.
customer_reviews.author: MamaO-b

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for some other feet but not mine.
customer_reviews.text: Replacing old UGG moccasin slippers and thought I'd try these so I wouldn't be tripping over the moccasin laces. These did not work out; way too large. UGG suggests to size up as there are not half sizes but these were like boats. With no adjustment like the moccasin style, nothing could be done. Had to return. Bought the moccasin style again and much better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality product and expensive
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of UGG slippers lasted 3 years, this pair is in bad shape already the inside is coming apart. I will not buy it again on line. I will go to the store and inspect the product before I buy it.
customer_reviews.author: P V S

customer_reviews.title: Supreme quality, but toooooo small
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo right. I usually wear an 8 in UGG shoes for 8.5 sized feet, but these were way too small. I think 7.5 would do better with an 8. I tried on the 9 at the store and they fit perfectly without socks. The quality was supreme, but they were too small.
customer_reviews.author: Romulus Prime

customer_reviews.title: FUR LINING UGG Ansley  Moccasin
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, however, there is too much sheepskin lining in the toe area. When you wear these it bunches up and makes feet sore on the bottom from folded over sheepskin lining on the bottom of your feet. WOW I did not expect a problem like this from a $100.00 slipper! You can feel the extra bulging lining when you put your fingers in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 5 1/2 shoe and I ordered a 6 and it was too small, so just be aware of it and make sure you can return them on Amazons dime.
customer_reviews.author: Wallingford

customer_reviews.title: Great moccasin - runs smalls
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I opted for ordering a size larger - though I was worried I’d be returning them - I’ve found them to be snug even a whole size larger. Very lovely materials and craftsmanship. Colors true to the photo.
customer_reviews.author: E. Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Dakotas for the last 10 years always in a 7 and I'm normally a 6.5. I've had three pairs of Dakotas. So I decided to try the Ansley but found the 7 slipping off my foot and the 6 beyond snug. Maybe the dakotas fit because I was able to lace them down with the lace?? Not sure. I'm afraid to chance seeing if the tight fitting 6 will stretch. Wanted to love. Would it be that big of deal to have a half size Ugg? Geez.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesky2

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 7 in most shoes. I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 in most shoes. I bought two of these UGGs in 7's and they were way too tight. Couldn't even get my feet in them without bulging veins. SO I ordered two more in size 8, one of them from this order and Amazon seller. Well, the 8 is still tight on my size 7 foot! I can get my foot in it without my veins bulging out, but it is still tight. ANd way too small for a size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette P

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these slippers as so many of my relatives own them and rave about them. I ordered a 7 which is my shoe size but I thought was too snug. I then returned and ordered the 8. I’ve been wearing over a month but it’s still tight and bothersome. My toes push against the front and it really hurts my whole foot. I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: They show beautiful quality and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: They show beautiful quality and craftsmanship. But they don't fit I had them all wrapped to send back, but my wife said "let my try them on again" So the wrapping etc is all destroyed, and I can't send them back. Perhaps my granddaughter can wear them. I would be more then happy to exchange them for a larger size, if you would send me a box, with a mailer. RR
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy and cute house slipper!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers however I was glad a looked at the reviews before I purchased them. I am usually about a size 9 1/2 and the reviews mentioned these run small. I purchased the size 10 and they just fit...so I would definitely size up. Also I have plantar fasciitis so it's important that I have shoes on consistently. I didn't expect there to be a lot of arch support in these, as most slippers don't have a lot. These definitely do not have arch support but they are very cozy due to the plush lining. I had to add an insert. I would definitely recommend these, cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Harberger

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought they were too small, but figured they would stretch. After on month of wearing they are just right and my feet are warm and toastie with a rubber sole that let me step out side to do a quick chore. WHy did I wai so long to get these????
customer_reviews.author: CrisB

customer_reviews.title: Need half sizes in these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers, however, I am an 8 1/2. I bought these in an 8 and a 9. The 8 was WAY too small and rubbed my heel when I tried it on, so I returned them. I tried on the 9 and my foot slipped badly in them. So I had to return these as well. I wish UGG would make these in half sizes as they do the boots now. I really want these slippers but their sizing doesn't work for me. Very quality product, just missing my size.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Owens

customer_reviews.title: If in between sizes order a size down
customer_reviews.text: I am size 8.5 in shoes. I checked my UGG boots before I ordered, which are a size 9. I was surprised at how big the slippers are. Size 9 was much too big for my 8.5 foot. I kept slipping out. I exchanged for size 8 and it is a better fit. I am able to slip my foot out easily and I’m a little concerned at how the lining will flatten over time. But a 7 would be much too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jean C.

customer_reviews.title: Just the Best
customer_reviews.text: These are pure quality UGG workmanship. I wear them almost everywhere I go, and wear them each day, all day long around the house. Superior warmth and has enough back support to help me with my lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Dicey

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. I spent a lot of time in them during the pandemic. They keep your feet very warm. I would put weather protector on them if you want to stroll outside with them. The bottom is very sturdy so you can do that easily.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S

customer_reviews.title: Snug but comfy
customer_reviews.text: These look just like the photo. As others have stated, they are a bit snug. I almost always wear an 8 women’s. I got the 8 in these and there a little tight, but not uncomfortable by any means. Hopefully they’ll stretch over time. An 8.5 would probably be perfect. I only use these as slippers around the house so they’re great for what I’m looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat UGG!
customer_reviews.text: I love Uggs but usually do not indulge myself in Ugg slippers. I was able to find this pair in a color that must not have been exciting to others, so the price was reasonable for Uggs! They are wonderful. I am sure that they will last much longer than my previous pair of Ugg-want-to-be slippers - which weren't cheap. I do always order my Uggs 1/2 size smaller as they run large. I wear 71/2 but ordered a 7 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: sandymeadows

customer_reviews.title: Slipper Love
customer_reviews.text: Funny how Santa knew just what I wanted for Christmas. I would normally never spend this much on slippers, but I decided to take a risk based on the great reviews. Delighted I did. Super comfy. Just enough arch and sole that it's not a glorified sock. I get compliments on these often. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Nati

customer_reviews.title: Great service and awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, unfortunately too narrow for the person I’ve got it for, had to return them, I’ve shoped and they’re the best once out there.
customer_reviews.author: Azat777

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: these slippers are THE BEST!! I didn't go up a half size though...they are a smidge tight but I have been wearing them for 2 weeks and they are much better!! I was worried they would be to big because my normal size is sometimes a 7.5..sometimes an 8...I bought the size 8. They are very comfy, really warm and I hate taking them off when I go to bed!! :) . I would buy them again in a minute!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: The BEST slippers!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of these slippers and I cant recommend them more. They are tight when you first get them, but start to loosen up within a couple days. So comfortable, warm, and mine have lasted 2 to 3 years each, and I wear them all the time. (Seriously, all day, every day.) I have had them in black, tan, and now slate... all are beautiful and so warm! (I'm not an Ugg boot fan, but I absolutely LOVE these slippers.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had better slipper for less money
customer_reviews.text: They weren’t for me. I think they are well made, and looks good. But the comfortable factor wasn’t there for me at all. Found my size too small, and the size up too large. The “tongue” of the shoe sits very low leaving top of foot exposed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sveinz

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and noticed many people said size up. I am a size 10 and I bought both the size 10 and 11. Unfortunately the 10 was to small, my toes hit the front of shoe and I can not see them stretching out enough. The 11's felt more comfortable but slipped off my heal when I walked. Wish there were half sizes. I was so excited because I love how warm Uggs keep my feet in the winter. Returning both pairs
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 and got a size 8 figuring they would stretch a bit. So uncomfortably tight, miserable to even attempt to keep them on. Retiring and trying something else. Not good for slightly wide feet. Is a very narrow slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Mnew

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted these slippers for quite some time , I caved in and fell into the Goldilocks syndrome . The first pair were too tight and the second pair were too big . Since they don’t come in half sizes I am out of luck . They are really nice .
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning the product because they ran extremely small. I didn't want to risk keeping them and hoping they would stretch over time. Instead of exchanging for another size I decided to choose a different pair of slippers. While these would be nice and warm during the winter they would be too hot in the spring and fall. I wanted something that I could wear year round.
customer_reviews.author: Flip Flop Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love these slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. They fit perfectly. They don't slip on or slip off the back of my heel which I was really worried about. I like that they have the hard bottom so that I can wear them outside to get the mail or sometimes I wear them with an outfit because they look like regular shoes. They keep my feet nice and warm without making them sweaty
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Blais

product_meta.title: UGG Women's Ansley Moccasin
product_meta.description: Indoor/outdoor suede slipper. Footwear Sizing Guide - If you are unsure which shoe size to purchase, please follow the following steps- Draw a straight line, longer than your foot, on a piece of paper.Place the paper on a flat surface. Stand on the line with your heel and longest toe centered on the line. If measuring a child's foot, it may be easier to hold the paper up to their foot.Place a mark on the line at the tip of the longest toe and at the back of the heel.Repeat the steps for the other foot.Measure the distance between the marks. Taking the larger of the two measurements, use the conversion chart to find your correct shoe size. The product has resistant materials
feature_bullets: Dyed Sheep, Fur Origin: United States/United Kingdom/Spain/Ireland/Australia
Molded rubber outsole for indoor/outdoor use
UGGpure wool insole. Fits True To Size
Available in whole sizes only. If between sizes, please order 1/2 size up from your usual size
